_meta.source: Researched from Indonesia Tourism, TripAdvisor, and local guides

bbox_hint.note: Covers Benoa, Seminyak, Ubud, and temple areas

label_overrides.uluwatu-temple: Uluwatu Temple (Kecak fire dance at sunset)

transit_routes.name: Private Driver
transit_routes.note: Best way to see Bali. Drivers act as guides. Negotiate full-day rate at port.

transit_routes.name: Ship Excursions
transit_routes.note: Convenient but less flexible than private driver.

featured_experiences.name: Uluwatu Temple & Kecak Dance
featured_experiences.note: Dance starts 6pm. Arrive early for good seats. Watch for monkeys stealing belongings.

featured_experiences.name: Ubud Cultural Day
featured_experiences.note: 90 min from port. Combine monkey forest, rice terraces, and artisan villages.

featured_experiences.name: Jimbaran Seafood Sunset
featured_experiences.note: Near cruise port. Choose fish from display. Touristy but atmospheric.
